original_text: And Jacob said, Nay, I pray thee, if now I have found grace in thy sight, then receive my present at my hand: for therefore I have seen thy face, as though I had seen the face of God, and thou wast pleased with me.
korean_text: 야곱이 이르되 그렇지 아니하니이다 내가 형님의 눈앞에서 은혜를 입었사오면 청하건대 내 손에서 이 예물을 받으소서 내가 형님의 얼굴을 뵈온즉 하나님의 얼굴을 본 것 같사오며 형님도 나를 기뻐하심이니이다

sentences.original_text: if now I have found grace in thy sight
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 당신 눈에 은혜를 입었다면

sentences.original_text: then receive my present at my hand
for therefore I have seen thy face
as though I had seen the face of God
and thou wast pleased with me
